data.actual_result: The voice channel box doesn't get pinned also it doesn't show any users at all besides yourself in the box
data.expected_result: It should show even when the overlay is closed when you pin it also show other people besides yourself
data.short_description: The pinned voice channel box is completely broken on the overlay, it doesn't show if the overlay is closed down, neither shows other people in the voice channel besides yourself
data.steps_to_repro: - Use the overlay in a game - Try to pin the voice channel box - Observe how it's not shown when closing down the overlay & not showing other server members besides yourself in the channel
